text: Ertharin Cousin (born 1957) was, from 2012 to 2017, the twelfth Executive Director of the United Nations World Food Programme. On June 9, 2009, Cousin was nominated by President Barack Obama to become United States Ambassador to the United Nations Agencies for Food and Agriculture. In November 2013 she was in Time magazine's list of "The 13 Gods of Food". She was born in Chicago. ==References== ==Other websites== *UNWFP page Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:United Nations officials
title: Ertharin Cousin
